oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Mad! Mad! Mad! (Mad Over You) and Pretty Dreamboat - John Dolan performance - 1958
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performances of Mad! Mad! Mad! (Mad Over You) and Pretty Dreamboat, written by John Dolan, and performed by John Dolan. Recording is most likely a demo performance.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: John Dolan
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) John Dolan [unconfirmed] performs "Mad! Mad! Mad! (Mad Over You)" [incomplete] / (1:54) John Dolan [unconfirmed] performs "Pretty Dreamboat"
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:isPartOf: [Hubbard-Antisdel letterhead] Song pitch letter dated 1958-09-30 and addressed from John Dolan to Eddy Arnold [typed], "Pretty Dreamboat" lyric sheet [typed], and "Mad! Mad! Mad!" lyric sheet [typed] stored with transcription documents, Box 4
